extension.name: it_zen
extension.author: IceTheme
extension.description:
Calming and tranquil with an emphasis on whitespace and open design. The perfect Joomla Template in case you want to finish your next website with ease, plus its FREE!

  • Template Page
  • View Demo
  • Get Support

field.name: TemplateStyle
field.label: Default Template Style
field.description: Select your default template style that you would like to use for your website, or Custom Style to specify your preferred color.

field.label: To specify your preferred color as the default Template Style, follow these steps:
field.description:
1. Select Custom Style from the Default Template Style Parameter above
2. Specify your desired Color from the Custom Color Parameter below
3. Click the Green Save button above to save the changes
4. Hit the Compile Less button below

field.name: TemplateCustomColor
field.label: Custom Color
field.description: Enter the Hex Value of your preferred color, or use the color picker. Remember to Save the changes before your hit the Compile Button below

field.name: compile
field.label: Compile LESS style
field.description: This will compile the LESS File to create the new CSS Custom Style which will be using the specified color above.

field.name: logo
field.label: Site Logo
field.description: Select your website logo image from your computer and chose it as the default logo.

field.name: responsivebarlogo
field.label: Site Logo (responsivebar)
field.description: Select your website logo image from your computer and chose it when the responsivebar on the left appear.

field.name: sidebar_position
field.label: Sidebar Position
field.description: Whether to display the sidebar on the left of the website on on the right

field.name: sidebar_span
field.label: Sidebar Width
field.description: The width of the main sidebar. Normal is recommended. You can not chose the exact paramter as the template is based on a responsive grid (bootstrap framework)

field.name: go2top
field.label: Go To Top Icon
field.description: Would you like to enable a scrolling image on the bottom right of your website so that you users can scroll to top easily?

field.name: hidefrontpage
field.label: Hide Frontpage Content?
field.description: Would you like to hide the frontpage view? (applicable only in home menu item)

field.name: it_params_welcome
field.label: Display Welcome Text
field.description: Display an welcome to our website text to the registered users on the header

field.name: it_params_equalcols
field.label: Equal Columns
field.description: Make the content area appear with white background to have the same height as the sidebar

field.name: showcase_image
field.label: Showcase background Image
field.description: Select the background image that you would like to display on the Showcase area

field.label: Advanced Settings
field.description: We reccomend that you dont change the following settings unless you are very sure for what you are doing

field.name: responsive_template
field.label: Enable Responsive?
field.description: If you Enable this parameter you will have a Responsive template , which will fit in every screen resolution. Such as smartphone and tablets. (Yes is recommended)

field.name: advanced_bootstrap
field.label: Enable Bootstrap?
field.description: Normally this should be enabled as it is required for the website to operate normally.

field.name: advanced_animations
field.label: Enable CSS3 Animations?
field.description: Animations for some modules to fade when the page scrolls to that part of the page

field.name: icelogo
field.label: IceTheme Logo?
field.description: A small IceTheme logo on the footer to let you visitors know the quality of your website

field.label: Offline Page - Enable/Disable
field.description: To enable or disable the offline page, go to System - Global Configuration - Site Settings.

field.name: offline_h2
field.label: Page Heading
field.description: Enter the main heading for your Coming Soon page

field.name: offline_p
field.label: Page Descrption
field.description: Enter some description for your website

field.name: offline_form
field.label: Enable Admin Login Form?
field.description: Would you like to enable the Login form so that Administrators can access the website. Guests and other users still will not be able to access your website

field.name: offline_count
field.label: Enable Countdown?
field.description: Would you like to enable the animated jQuery countdown?. If set to yes enter the correct time below

field.name: offline_count_time
field.label: Countdown time
field.description: Enter here the correct time format when your website will be online. E.g '31 December 2013 12:00:00'

field.name: offline_newsletter
field.label: Newsletter Code
field.description: Enter here your Newsletter code provided by the Newsleter company

field.name: offline_social
field.label: Social Media
field.description: Enter here your HTML code to generate the Social Icons

field.name: custom_css_code
field.label: Custom CSS
field.description: You may enter here your Custom CSS code to overwrite the default CSS that we have added on the template. Also you may paste here CSS codes that our support team may have given to you.
